name: ccserver
description: A Minecraft client that interfaces through ComputerCraft turtles.

scripts.build: tsc -p src/shared/tsconfig.server.json && npx tsc -p src/server/tsconfig.json && tstl -p src/shared/tsconfig.client.json && tstl -p src/turtle/tsconfig.json
scripts.watch: npx concurrently --kill-others "npx tsc -w -p src/shared/tsconfig.server.json" "npx tstl -w -p src/shared/tsconfig.client.json" "npm run watch-server" "npm run watch-client"
